message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you our top-of-the-line product! I'm willing to offer it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate it, but I was hoping to find a price closer to my budget. Would you consider selling the product for $95?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $110.
